episodes.title: The CULT of New Zealand that exists RIGHT NOW
episodes.description:
Inside Gloriavale: New Zealand’s Hidden Cult

Explore the secretive world of Gloriavale Christian Community, a remote sect in New Zealand's South Island. Founded in 1969 by Neville Cooper, known as Hopeful Christian, Gloriavale presents itself as a devout Christian commune. However, investigations and testimonies from former members reveal a pattern of systemic abuse, including forced labor, sexual assault, and psychological manipulation. Despite legal actions and public scrutiny, the community's insular nature has allowed these practices to persist for decades. This video delves into the dark realities of life within Gloriavale, shedding light on the experiences of those who have escaped and the ongoing efforts to hold its leaders accountable.
